resources.string: This will be the text that is displayed word by word in the reading window. It will eventually be provided by reading a text file stored on the device. The words will be presented one at a time at a set rate of speed with an extra pause at the end of a sentence. I will later add controls to review wind the text to the last sentence. I will also be adding controls to save the text at the current point so the reader can resume at a later time. The ultimate version will provide feedback on reading rate, percentage completed and time spent reading.
